title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: REXY, Queen of the Desert! Gravel Race
content:
Photo submitted by Jason Reid, “Sunrise during the REXY, Queen of the Desert! gravel race from Fruita, CO, to Moab, UT.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: REXY, Queen of the Desert! Gravel Race appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
